message:
This is a little bit lazy, but I'm looking for prebaked solution or at least some leads, I have the line:
    nmap <leader>cd :lcd %:h<CR>
in my vimrc which changes to the parent dir of current file
what I'm looking for is something similar, that searches up until it finds a .git dir, and makes that the CWD
@ptone I'm using vim-rooter for that purpose: https://github.com/airblade/vim-rooter
looks like exactly what I was looking for, thanks
